simaerep 0.0.0.9000

evaluate sites

eval_sites.Rd

evaluate site simulations by assigning a probability to each scoring values using the score distributions of the study simulations. Then calculate the P/fp ratio for each site.

eval_sites(df_sim_sites, r_sim_sites = 1000)

Arguments

df_sim_sites

dataframe generated by sim_sites()
r_sim_sites

integer, simulation repeats for prob_lower for site simulation, Default: 1000

Value

dataframe

Details

zero probabilities are being replaced by the site minimum for ecd_pval / 10 and by 1/r_sim_sites / 10

Examples

df_visit <- boot_sim_test_data_study(n_pat = 100, n_sites = 5,
    frac_site_with_ur = 0.4, ur_rate = 0.6)

df_visit$study_roche <- "A"
df_site <- site_aggr(df_visit)

df_sim_sites <- sim_sites(df_site, df_visit, r = 100)

df_eval <- eval_sites(df_sim_sites, r_sim_sites = 100)
df_eval
